title: Blast furnace
brief_description: Elementary treatment illustrating processes by which iron ore is smelted in a blast furnace to produce cast iron. The following aspects are covered: layout of furnace, pre-heating and other plant; raw materials used and method of charging furnace; operation of furnace; tapping of slag and molten metal; sealing tap holes; castings of molten metal into pigs.
